channel.title: ... cmon a little help... please
channel.description: ok so far no one has helped me... every where is wild need help changing that... and when i attack with wepons they go away and punch how do i change that...? and i want to place objects how do i do that and does any 1 have a list? next i would like to know how i would change the help of an npc? ... any help at all please

item.title: ... cmon a little help... please
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

I don’t know much of silab capible sources, but it’s not hard to add… I would go on to www.rune-server.org then click forums on the top bar, then scroll down to rs2 private servers or something like that, then click on downlaods, then on the top with all the posts (The stickies) there should be like a source server list or whatever… and then there’ll be a huge list of source server… :), Have Fun!

Read full topic

item.title: ... cmon a little help... please
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Yes, but it will go through alot of work, first you need to add the nonWild method, then you need to find the very bottom left of the game, then the very top right of the game, then you need to put those coords together, then the punching part you need to set new animations to the weapons… and etc… I suggest what I said before… I see no reason why you are in love with that server…

Read full topic
